Eliza & Ethan dresses are ideal for bridesmaids as they are one size fits all, come in several different colours, do not crease and can be worn many ways! If we are out of stock of the colour you want we can order it in.
A selection of long jumpsuits and short rompers and cute shorts

a.title: Jewellery, accessories, rings, earrings, bangles, bracelets, necklaces and lots more bling!
Swarovski embellished bangles in every colour!

Cuffs with attitude featuring phrases such as "Fashion Icon Forever", "Biatch", "Dazed Not Confused", "Hottie", "Diva Doll" and more! Laser cut and embellished with Swarovski crystals in a rainbow of colours.
A collection of elegant, classy, funky and affordable watches
Earrings
Stunning crystal necklaces, costume jewellery and semi-precious stones
Stunning stilletos, sexy boots, pretty sandals and more!
Sexy shoes that are hand-made and customised especially for Alila! Some of these shoes are so special that only 6 pairs have been made in the world, just for Alila!
Sexy boots with a bit of attitude!
Keep your feet looking pretty in these gorgeous sandals and flip-flops
Gorgeous wedges for added height and comfort too!

Top Secret Bandeau tops
Suecomma Bonnie shoes are all custom made exclusively for Alila. The majority of styles have been customised so there are only 6 pairs made per style. All handmade with the highest quality materials.

FunkyBling Cuffs are a totally unique and fresh concept originating from iconic Soho. Our collection is a true reflection of the constantly changing tastes and moods of the contemporary woman. We work in a wide spectrum of colours which together with our fun and quirky mottoes can be mixed and remixed to create a limitless variety of style statements; from bold and daring cuffs which play with the futuristic punk trend, high contrast vivid neons symbolic of the new rave to pieces which quite simply embody the glamour and sex appeal of the party princesses whose wrists they adorn!We use only the highest quality materials. All our cuffs are made from acrylic, laser cut and then hand finished according to the desired specifications. There are three crystallization options; Basic, Semi or Full and Swarovski crystals are used throughout.
Mila Louise designer hand crafted leather bags.
Irish designed Minette shoes like to make your feet look pretty!
Strutt Couture designer shoes from the UK use the highest quality leathers and fabrics sourced from all over the world to produce sexy stilettos and boots.
True to their name the 'Bijou de Pied' shoes and sandals are like jewels that offer women a distinct style and a certain edge.
Custom made shoes exclusive to Alila in Ireland. Handmade in Romania. Veronees
Dessy Bridesmaids CollectionFor a complete range of styles see www.dessy.com

Kate Fearnley’s unique and quirky use of fabrics, designs and colours present her followers season after season with something bold, new and exciting; enabling the wearers to stand out from the crowd.

New York-based designer Jay Godfrey is the founder and creative director behind his eponymous collection of sleek, sexy and sophisticated designs. Perpetually inspired by the chic New York woman, Godfrey’s goal as a designer is to meld the classic tailoring techniques of Savile Row with modern silhouettes and luxurious fabrics.
Elegant, classy and funky costume watches
Whitney Eve is the collection by Whitney Port, star of MTV programmes "The Hills" and "The City"
Mascara Collections consists of dresses for every occassion, weddings, parties, mother of bride/groom, black tie events.

OTT is for Funky Fabulous women who know about fashion and want to have fun with it! Beautiful kitsch couture, terrific trash, fantastic flash and all things over the top! Each piece is made individually by hand resulting in wonderfully unique and fabulous creations.
Eliza & Ethan Multi Way Wrap Dress, One size fits all, doesn't crease, so versatile its practically magic!
